- For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 1 per 1 initiative you have.
Energy Boon

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, Energy Boon raises the maximum Health of you and target ally by 1...3...3 for each point of your respective maximum Energy. When this enchantment is first applied, you and your target gain 1...10...12 Energy. You gain an additional 1 Energy for every 2 points you have in Energy Storage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase in initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Expel Hexes
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Safely expel two hexes from a creature, by bending the weave around them.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest two harmful spells on the target ends.
Expel Hexes
Elite Spell. Remove up to 2 Hexes from target ally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blessed Light
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Shine down the blessed light of the gods on a creature, ailing them of hurt and malediction.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier, and you end the latest harmful spell and the latest harmful condition on the target.
Blessed Light
Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 10...114...140 Health and remove one condition and one hex.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Cultist's Fervor
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Whip yourself into a fervor, by using a ceremonial dagger to carve eldritch runes in your flesh, which empower your spellcasting.
For the duration, you start {@condition bleeding|GW}, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
For the duration, when you cast a necromancy themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is {@dice 1d4} level higher than the one used in the casting.
Cultist's Fervor

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds and 3 seconds longer for every rank of Soul Reaping, your Necromancer spells cost -1...5...6 Energy to cast but you suffer from Bleeding for 10 seconds each time you cast a Necromancer spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Broad Head Arrow

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Fire a broad head arrow, which flies slower, but dazes creatures on impact.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within the first range increment of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, is {@condition dazed|GW} for the duration and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell fails and has no effect.
Broad Head Arrow
Elite Bow Attack. You shoot a broad head arrow that moves slower than normal. If it hits, target foe is Dazed for 5...17...20 seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell that spell is interrupted.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Clamor of Souls
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Create a cacophony of gibbering souls in an area, discharging their pent-up frustration.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d12} lightning damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
If you are holding an object created by a spell or if there is at least one friendly {@variantrule summoning ritua|GW}within range, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting.
Clamor of Souls
Elite Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 10...54...65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit or holding a bundle item, you gain 10 Energy.

m.text: a golden bell blessed by a priest, worth 100+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Auspicious Parry
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 1, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Get ready to block an attack, and have an adrenaline rush when this stance ends.
For the duration, the next time you are attacked, the attack misses and this spell ends.
When this spell ends, you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of Adrenaline.
Auspicious Parry
Elite Stance. For 8 seconds, the next attack against you is blocked. You gain 1...3...4 strike[s] of adrenaline when this stance ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the adrenaline gain increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Aura of Displacement
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Shadow step to a creature, leaving behind a faint glowing aura, which allows you to teleport back.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. Teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. When this spell ends, teleport to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the location you originally cast this spell, if you are still on the same plane of existence and within 1000 feet of it.
Aura of Displacement
Elite Enchantment Spell. When you cast Aura of Displacement, Shadow Step to target foe. When you stop maintaining Aura of Displacement you return to your original location.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the range restriction of the spell increases by 1000 feet for each slot level above 2nd.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, you do not need to be on the same plane of existence to teleport back.

spell.name: Gust
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Conjure the breath of twin air elementals around you and an ally.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, you and the target gain the following benefits:
- For the duration, your speed is increased by 33%.

- Target each creature other than you within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 5d8} cold damage and, if a target attacked on its last turn, is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect.
Gust

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds, both you and target ally move 33% faster. When you cast this spell, all foes near you and your target take 15...59...70 cold damage. Foes struck by Gust while attacking or moving are knocked down.

components.m: the bottled breath of an air elemental

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Lyssa's Aura
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Invoke the power of the goddess of beauty and illusions.
For the duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 12 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
When you cast a spell, the duration of this spell resets.
Lyssa's Aura
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, you have +0...4...5 Energy regeneration. This enchantment reapplies itself every time you cast a spell on a foe.

m.text: a statue of Lyssa, worth 300+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Boon Signet
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
The next spell you cast that targets only one creature and heals them, heals them for twice the amount.
Boon Signet
Elite Signet. Heal target ally for 20...68...80 Health. Your next Healing or Protection Prayer [sic] spell that targets an ally heals for an additional 20...68...80 Health.

spell.name: Discord
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Sow discord in a creature's mind by amplifying its already present suffering.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the target is suffering from a negative condition and is under the effect of a detrimental spell, the target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 5d8}), 11th level ({@dice 7d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 9d8}).
Discord
Elite Spell. If target foe is suffering from a condition and under the effects of a hex or an enchantment, that foe suffers 30...94...110 damage.

spell.name: Enraged Lunge
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Command your companion to attempt an Enraged Lunge, inflicting a {@condition deep wound|GW} on a hit.

Choose one companion, that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Enraged Lunge
Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that applies a Deep Wound to target foe for 5...17...20 seconds and deals +10...42...50 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Consume Soul
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Siphon off the life force of a creature, attempting to destroy all summoned creatures in an area.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. Then, if you hit, target each summoned creature in a 20-foot-radius centered on the target. Each new target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
Consume Soul
Elite Spell. You steal 5...49...60 Health from target foe. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take 25...105...125 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Beguiling Haze
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Conjure a beguiling haze around a creature, while teleporting to them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition dazed|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Beguiling Haze
Elite Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. That foe becomes Dazed for 3...8...9 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the range of the spell increases by 15 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Mirror of Ice
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Summon two mirrors of ice around yourself and an ally, then shatter them.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. You and the target are both the origin of the following effect:

- Target each creature other than you within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} cold damage, and for the duration the target's speed is reduced by 66%. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect.
If you damage a creature already under the effect of a detrimental water themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On an 11 or higher, this spell does not expend a spell slot.
Mirror of Ice

Elite Hex Spell. Shatter a Mirror of Ice. All foes near you and target ally take 15...59...70 cold damage and move 66% slower for 2...5...6 seconds. If you strike a foe hexed with Water Magic, Mirror of Ice recharges 50% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Power Leech

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Violently interrupt the casting of a spell by implanting a psychic leech.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within range. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, for the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d4} per spell slot level and your initiative gets increased by the amount lost.
Power Leech
Elite Hex Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and for 10 seconds, whenever that foe casts a spell, you steal up to 5...13...15 Energy from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the final reduction in initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Empathic Removal
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Relive the burden of yourself and an ally.

Choose one creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. You and the target regain 5 hit points, and you end the latest harmful spell and the latest harmful condition on yourself and the target.
Empathic Removal
Elite Spell. You and target other ally lose 1 condition and 1 hex, and are healed for 50.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by 5 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Icy Veins
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Rapidly freeze a creature's insides, making them explode when they die.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} cold damage.

Additionally, for the duration, if the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on the target and then target each other hostile creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the creature. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a new target takes {@damage 5d8} cold damage. On a successful save, a new target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
Icy Veins
Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...74...90 cold damage. For 10...30...35 seconds, if target foe dies all nearby foes are struck for 20...92...110 cold damage.

spell.name: Equinox
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Call forth a spirit of equinox, draining spell casters of energy when they cast spells.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and casts a spell, a creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they gain 2 rounds of {@condition overcast|GW}.
Equinox
Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Spells cast within its range that cause Overcast cause an additional 10 Overcast. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Defiant Was Xinrae
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Urn|GWF}
Create a scarlet urn containing the ashes of Xinrae, protecting you from large impacts, and siphoning off health when you drop it.

You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, when you would take damage, if that damage would be more than 20% of your maximum hit points, reduce the damage to 20% of your maximum hit points.

When you drop this urn, target each hostile creature within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. You regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Defiant Was Xinrae

Elite Item Spell. Hold Xinrae's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. When you drop her ashes, you steal 5...41...50 Health from all nearby foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dragon Slash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 10, {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Channel the dragon of the canthan empire, striking with the ferocity of a dragon's claw.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d10} damage, and you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenaline.
Dragon Slash
Elite Sword Attack. If Dragon Slash hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage and gain 1...4...5 strike[s] of adrenaline.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d10} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Dark Apostasy
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Sever a creatures' connection to reality on a critical strike.
For the duration, when you score a critical hit against a target, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends.
Dark Apostasy

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3...14...17 seconds, every time you successfully land a critical hit, you remove one enchantment from your target. If you remove an enchantment in this way, you lose 10...5...4 Energy or Dark Apostasy ends.

spell.name: Ride the Lightning (Guild Wars)

entries: Ride the Lightning

Elite Spell. You Ride the Lightning to target. All adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...4...5 second[s]. If your target is a foe, it is struck for 10...58...70 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

components.m: a lute strung with metal strings

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Transform yourself into a lightning bolt, instantly transporting yourself and exploding in a blinding flash.

Choose an unoccupied space that you can see within range. Teleport to that space, and each creature of your choice in a 10-Emination must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d12} lightning damage and is {@condition blinded} for the duration. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 3rd and the range of the spell increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Psychic Distraction

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Cause a momentary distraction in a creature's mind, potentially interrupting their action and making them unable to use it again for a short while.
For the duration, you cannot cast spells other than {@spell Psychic Distraction|GW} or use any abilities.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. The creature makes an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the spell/ability dissipates with no effect, the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast/use it is wasted, and the creature cannot use that spell/ability again for the duration. If a spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.
Psychic Distraction
Elite Spell. All of your other skills are disabled for 8 seconds. If target foe is using a skill, that skill is interrupted and disabled for an additional 5...11...12 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Healing Burst
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Fire a projectile of healing energy, which explodes into a flash of healing energy.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6}. Additionally, each friendly creature, which the target can see, within a 150-foot Emanation centered on the target, regains hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing each increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Healing Burst

Elite Spell. Target ally is healed for 10...130...160. All party members in earshot of your target gain Health equal to the Divine Favor bonus from this spell. Your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.

spell.name: Order of Apostasy
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}, {@variantrule Order|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 10%
Induct your allies into the Order of Apostasy, dragging creatures down to their heretical levels by removing their protections.
Target each friendly creature within range. For the duration, when a target hits with a weapon attack, the latest beneficial spell on the attack target ends.
Order of Apostasy

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage, that foe loses one enchantment. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose 25...17...15% maximum Health.

components.m: a holy text sullied by demon ichor

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Famine
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Call forth a famine, inducing intense pain in any creature starved of energy.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. If a creature starts its turn within 120 feet of the nature spirit, and its initiative is 0 or lower, it takes {@damage 6d8} necrotic damage.
Famine

Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit creature in its range reaches 0 Energy, that creature takes 10...30...35 damage. This spirit dies after 30...78...90 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Grasping Was Kuurong
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Urn|GWF}
Create a scarlet urn containing the ashes of Kuurong, releasing her spirit in a whirlwind of energy, when dropping the ashes.

You create an urn in your hands. When you drop this urn, target each creature other than you within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d12} lightning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.
Grasping Was Kuurong
Elite Item Spell. Hold Kuurong's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are struck for 15...63...75 damage and knocked down.

components.m: the ashes of a Gulthias Blight

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Enraged Smash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Channel the fury of battle into a devastating smash.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of Adrenaline, and if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target takes an additional {@damage 2d6} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Enraged Smash
Elite Hammer Attack. If Enraged Smash hits, you gain 1...3...4 strike[s] of adrenaline. If you hit a moving foe, you strike for +10...34...40 damage, and target foe is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Flashing Blades
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Conjure a cloud of daggers around yourself, which block incoming attacks and retaliate at attackers.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and if an attack misses you because of this bonus, target the attacking creature. The target takes {@damage 2d6} slashing damage.
Flashing Blades
Elite Stance. For 5...25...30 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks while attacking. If you block an attack in this way, your attacker takes 5...17...20 damage.

m.text: a dagger worth 2+ GP, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Second Wind
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 2
Gain a second wind by redistributing your Overcast.
You regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per round of Overcast on you, and your initiative gets increased by 1 per round of Overcast.
Second Wind
Elite Spell. You gain 1 Energy and 5 Health for each point of Energy restricted by Overcast. You lose all enchantments.

spell.name: Psychic Instability

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Interrupt a foe and create a psychic shockwave on a success, knocking creatures {@condition prone}.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell/ability dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, each hostile creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes is knocked {@condition prone}.
To stand up from {@condition prone}, a target must first succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or waste its movement in the attempt.
Psychic Instability
Elite Spell. Interrupt the target foe's action. If that action was a skill, that foe and nearby foes are knocked down for 2...4...4 seconds. (50% failure chance with Fast Casting 4 or less.)

spell.name: Soothing Memories
entries: Heal a creature's wounds by reminding it of pleasant memories.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d12} + your spellcasting ability modifier. If you are holding an object created by a spell, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting. You can only regain a spell slot this way once per short rest.
Soothing Memories
Spell. Target ally is healed for 10...82...100 Health. If you are holding an item, you gain 3 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Healing Light
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Bathe a creature in healing light.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier. If you are under the effect of a beneficial {@status Concentration|XPHB} spell, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting. You can only regain a spell slot this way thrice per short rest.
Healing Light
Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 40...88...100 Health. If your target has an enchantment, you gain 1...3...3 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Soul Bind
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Bind up a soul of a creature, retaliating at all who dare help it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when the target regains hit points, target the healer. The new target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage.

components.m: a length of rope made of phase spider silk

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Soul Bind
Elite Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 20...68...80 damage. This hex ends if target is suffering from a Smiting Prayers hex.

spell.name: Glass Arrows
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Preparation|GW}
Tip your arrows with glass heads, which shatter on impact, {@condition bleeding|GW} if blocked.

For the duration, when you miss a target with a ranged weapon attack, they must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 3d4} damage. Additionally, if you hit a target, they take an additional {@damage 3d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Glass Arrows
Elite Preparation. For 10...30...35 seconds, your arrows strike for +5...17...20 damage if they hit and cause Bleeding for 10...18...20 seconds if they are blocked.

m.text: arrowheads made of glass worth 50+ GP, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd and the damage of the {@condition bleeding|GW} condition increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Preservation
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Preservation|GWF}
Bind a Spirit of Preservation to your will, healing one of your allies every turn.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Preservation|GWF} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DMs control.
Preservation
Elite Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. Every 4 seconds, this spirit heals one non-spirit ally in the area for 10...94...115 Health. This spirit dies after 90 seconds.

spell.name: Forceful Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Unblockable|GW}
You deliver a particularly forceful blow, weakening your target and knocking them out of any stance they were in.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, any stance on the target ends, and they are weakened for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Forceful Blow

Elite Hammer Attack. If Forceful Blow hits, you strike for +10...26...30 damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. Target foe suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds. This attack cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Locust's Fury
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Unleash a swam of locust, which sometimes strike at your opponents.
For the duration, when you make a weapon attach with a weapon with light and thrown property, if you roll a 16 or higher on the die, you can immediately attack again.
Locust's Fury
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...30...35 seconds, you have an additional 50% chance to double strike while using daggers.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shatterstone
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Lodge an unstable chunk of ice into a creature's flesh, which explodes in a violent explosion of ice shards a few seconds later.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 6d8} cold damage and is hexed with Shatterstone. When this spell ends, target each hostile creature in a 15-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} cold damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Shatterstone

Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 25...85...100 cold damage and is hexed with Shatterstone for 3 seconds. When Shatterstone ends, that foe and all nearby foes are struck for 25...85...100 cold damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Recurring Insecurity
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Psychically torture a creature by replaying one of it's greatest insecurities.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 2d12} psychic damage.
When this spell ends, and the target is under the effect of another detrimental spell, the target is immediately hexed with Recurring Insecurity again.
Recurring Insecurity
Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe suffers from -1...4...5 Health degeneration. If that foe has another hex when Recurring Insecurity would end, it is reapplied.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Life Sheath
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Sheath a creature in a reversing aura.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. End the latest two harmful conditions on the target. Additionally, for the duration, the next time the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage and the target regains hit points equal to the number rolled.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Sheath

Elite Enchantment Spell. Remove 0...2...2 condition[s] from target ally. For 8 seconds, the next time that ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead (maximum 20...84...100).

spell.name: Spoil Victor
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Punish a creature for targeting weaker creatures than it with a crown made of blood, which spikes them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target targets a creature with fewer hit points than it with an attack or spell, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Spoil Victor
Elite Hex Spell. For 3...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or casts a spell on a creature with less Health, that foe loses 25...85...100 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Heal as One
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Channel the primal bond of wilderness between yourself and your companion.

Choose one companion that you can see within range. You and the target regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spell casting ability modifier. Additionally, for the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage, and the target regains hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt.

Alternatively, you target a companion that has died within the last minute. The companion returns to life with 10% of their maximum hit points. This spell can't return to life a companion that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
This spell can be used instead of the {@spell Charm Animal|GW} spell , to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on a companion {@condition charmed} by it.
Heal as One

Elite Skill. For 15 seconds, your animal companion steals 1...16...20 Health whenever it hits with an attack. You and your companion are both healed for 20...87...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it's resurrected with 50% Health. If you have this skill equipped, your companion will travel with you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st and the % increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ritual Lord
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 2%
Tap into the primeval power of previous spirit channelers by consuming a bit of your own blood as tithe to boost your ritualism spells.

While casting a ritualist themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can simultaneously cast this spell. When doing so, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting.
You cannot cast this spell again for 1 minute, unless the spell empowered by this spell was a spell which summoned/created a creature.
At 5th level, you cast the empowered spell with a spell slot which is two levels higher. This level increase increases by 1 when you reach 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).
Ritual Lord

Elite Skill. For 5...29...35 seconds, your Ritualist attributes are boosted by 2...4...4 for your next skill. If that skill is a Binding Ritual, it recharges 10...50...60% faster and Ritual Lord recharges instantly.

spell.name: Primal Rage
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 4, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Channel the primal rage of ancient times, letting a spirit of the wild overtake you.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn and your speed is increased by 25%, but you take 50% more damage.
Primal Rage
Elite Stance. For 1...12...15 second[s], you attack 33% faster and move 25% faster, but you take double damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Moebius Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light and thrown property

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Off-Hand Attack|GWF:} Must instead follow a {@variantrule Dual Attack|GWF}.
Weave your dagger in a geometric shape, bending space-time and allowing you to act quicker than normal.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d6} damage and, if the target is now below 50% of their maximum hit points, you can immediately attack again.
Moebius Strike

Elite Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a Dual Attack. If it hits, Moebius Strike strikes for +10...30...35 damage. If you strike a foe whose Health is below 50%, all your other attack skills are recharged.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Shockwave
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Release a massive shockwave at your location, kicking up dust and debris.

Target each creature other than you within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d8} force damage, and is {@condition blinded} for the duration.

Then, target each creature other than you within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} bludgeoning damage, and has {@condition cracked armor|GW} for the duration.

Finally, target each creature other than you within a 20-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} piercing damage, and is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Shockwave

Elite Spell. All foes in the area take 15...51...60 earth damage and are Weakened for 1...8...10 second[s]. Nearby foes also take +15...51...60 earth damage and have Cracked Armor for 1...8...10 second[s]. Adjacent foes suffer the previous effects, take +15...51...60 earth damage, and are Blinded for 1...8...10 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Shared Burden
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Send flashes of traumatic experiences through a group of creatures, slowing them down.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, a target can't cast spells as reactions, must cast spells which take a bonus action as an action, and any other spell takes twice as long to cast. Additionally, for the duration, a target's speed is halved, regardless of a target's abilities or magic items, a target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.
Shared Burden
Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ray of Judgment
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Bring down divine judgment, eviscerating everything.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 30-foot-radius, 10-mile-high cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 15d8} radiant damage and starts {@condition burning|GW} for 1 round, taking {@damage 5d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder to a different location within range and sight.
Ray of Judgment

Elite Spell. Invoke a Ray of Judgment at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to this location take 5...37...45 holy damage each second and begin Burning for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 10th level or higher, the radiant damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 9th.

spell.name: Vampiric Spirit
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Invoke the spirit of a vampire to steal health from a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. Additionally, For the duration at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} hit points.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Vampiric Spirit
Elite Enchantment Spell. Steal up to 5...41...50 Health from target foe. For 10 seconds, you have +5...9...10 Health regeneration.

components.m: the fang of a vampire encased in amber

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage and healing each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Lacerate
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Summon a nature spirit of laceration, intensifying slashing damage and {@condition bleeding|GW} everything on death.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and takes slashing damage, they take an additional {@damage 4d4} damage. Additionally, when the spirit disappears, each creature within 120 feet of it starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 4d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Lacerate

Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Bleeding creatures within its range suffer -2 Health degeneration. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit creatures within its range that have less than 90% Health begin Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Signet of Spirits
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest, {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Anger|GWF}, {@creature Spirit of Hate|GWF}, {@creature Spirit of Suffering|GWF}
Activate your signet of Spirits, calling forth three dark spirits to aid you.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Anger|GWF}, a {@creature Spirit of Hate|GWF} and a {@creature Spirit of Suffering|GWF} for the duration. The spirits are friendly to you and your allies. The spirits act on your initiative, but take their turn directly after yours. The spirits are in the DMs control.
Signet of Spirits
Elite Signet. Create 3 level 1...10...12 spirits. These spirits deal 5...17...20 damage with attacks and die after 60 seconds.

spell.name: Quivering Blade

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5, {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Vibrate your blade at a disrupting frequency and then slash at your opponent, disorienting them if they moved.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition dazed|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Quivering Blade
Elite Sword Attack. If Quivering Blade hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage. If this attack hits a moving foe, that foe is Dazed for 5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Palm Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Deliver a palm strike to a creature's legs, crippling them.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects takes {@damage 2d6} damage, is {@condition crippled|GW} for 1 round and this attack counts as an {@variantrule Off-Hand Attack|GWF}.
Palm Strike
Elite Skill. Target touched foe takes 10...54...65 damage and is Crippled for 1...4...5 second[s]. This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Star Burst
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Release a miniature supernova from your hands, incinerating everything.

You touch a creature. Target each hostile creature in a 20-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GW} for 1 round, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
If the number of creatures who took damage is equal or greater to the level of the spell slot expended, you regain that spell slot.
Star Burst
Elite Spell. Target touched foe and all foes in the area are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3...4 second[s]. For each foe you hit, gain 2 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Shatter Storm
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Bombard a creature with a flurry of magic shattering spikes, removing all beneficial spells from them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. All beneficial spells on the target end. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, {@spell Shatter Storm|GW} cannot be used again until N rounds have passed, where N is the number of spells ended.
Shatter Storm
Elite Spell. Target foe loses all enchantments. For each enchantment removed this way, Shatter Storm is disabled for an additional 7 seconds.

spell.name: Withdraw Hexes
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Gently ease the suffering of a group of allies.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Target each friendly creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. All harmful {@status Concentration|XPHB} spells on a target end. If a harmful spell was ended this way, {@spell Withdraw Hexes|GW} cannot be used again until N rounds have passed, where N is the number of spells ended.
Withdraw Hexes
Elite Spell. Remove all hexes from target ally and all adjacent allies. This spell takes an additional 20...8...5 seconds to recharge for each hex removed in this way.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Wail of Doom
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 10%
Release a piercing wail of doom, rending the soul from a creature's body.
Choose one creature that can hear you within range. For the duration, the target's ability scores are set to 1 and their proficiency bonus is set to 0.
Wail of Doom
Elite Hex Spell. For 1...3...4 second[s], all of target foe's attributes are set to 0.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 10th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 9th.

spell.name: Melandru's Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Invoke the vine wrath of Melandru with your next shot.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 3d4} damage and if the target willingly moved on its last turn or is {@condition prone}, the target takes an additional {@damage 2d6} damage and is also {@condition crippled|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Melandru's Shot

Elite Bow Attack. If Melandru's Shot hits, your target begins Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds. If it hits a foe that is moving or knocked down, that foe takes +10...22...25 damage and is Crippled for 5...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Soul Twisting
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Twist the souls of the creatures summoned by your Summoning Rituals, reducing the burden on yourself.

For the duration, when you cast a spell which summons/creates a creature, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is {@dice 1d4} levels lower than required (minimum 1). The creature summoned/created this way still treats the spell slot used as the original one for the purpose of determining its stat block.
Additionally, you can take any {@action Magic|XPHB} Action which summons/creates creatures as a bonus action.
Soul Twisting
Elite Skill. For 5...37...45 seconds, your Binding Rituals cost 15 less Energy (minimum 10) and recharge instantly. Soul Twisting ends after 1...3...3 Binding Ritual[s].

m.text: a knotted rope made of spirit fiber worth 750+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the spell slot reduction increases by 1 for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Seeping Wound
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Magically worsen an already existing wound by making acid start pouring from it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. For the duration, the target's speed is reduced by 33%, and at the start of each of the target's turns, if the target is suffering from at least one harmful condition, the target takes {@damage 8d4} acid damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage at the start of each turn for the duration, but suffers no other effect.
Seeping Wound
Elite Hex Spell. For 1...6...7 second[s], target foe moves 33% slower. That foe takes 5...21...25 damage each second while suffering from a condition. This spell has half the normal range.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Unsteady Ground
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Create an area of unstable ground by causing extreme vibrations.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 15-foot-radius, 10-foot-high cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d8} force damage, and targets who attacked on their last turn are knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 30 feet.
Unsteady Ground
Elite Spell. You create Unsteady Ground at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, nearby foes take 10...34...40 earth damage each second. Attacking foes struck by Unsteady Ground are knocked down.

components.m: a small branch with leaves and a handful of sand

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Stolen Speed
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Slow down creatures and invert the time flow around them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, a target can't cast spells as reactions, must cast spells which take a bonus action as an action, and any other spell takes twice as long to cast. Additionally, any spell, which takes an action to cast, targeting only creatures affected by Stolen Speed, can be cast as a bonus action.
Stolen Speed

Elite Hex Spell. For 1...8...10 seconds, spells cast by the target foe and all adjacent foes take 100% longer to cast. Spells targeting these foes that are cast by you or your allies take 50% less time to cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Word of Censure
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Speak a word of censure, restricting a creatures' life force.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 5d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
If the target was below 33% of their maximum hit points, {@spell Word of Censure|GW} cannot be used again until 2 rounds have passed.
Word of Censure
Elite Spell. Target foe takes 15...63...75 holy damage. If your target was below 33% Health, Word of Censure takes 20 additional seconds to recharge.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Weaken Knees
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Give a creature phantom pains, especially while they move, by temporarily aging them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage. Additionally, for every 5 it travels, it takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage.
Weaken Knees
Elite Hex Spell. For 1...13...16 second[s], target foe suffers -1...3...4 Health degeneration and takes 5...9...10 damage while moving.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Trapper's Focus
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Preparation|GW}
Intensely focus on your ability to lay traps and surviving.

For the duration, you can cast spells, which take a minute to cast, which place some kind of trap, as an action, and cannot be interrupted while doing so. Additionally, when you cast a wilderness survival themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is {@dice 1d4} levels higher than the one used in the casting.
Trapper's Focus
Elite Preparation. For 12...22...24 seconds, your trap skills are not easily interruptible and your Wilderness Survival attribute is increased by +0...2...2.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell slot increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Spirit Channeling
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Channel the spirits of great spellcaster.
For the duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 4th level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 12 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
If there is at least one friendly {@variantrule summoning ritua|GW}within 150-feet of you, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting of this spell.
Spirit Channeling
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 12 seconds, you have +1...5...6 Energy regeneration. When you cast this spell, you gain 3...10...12 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shove
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}

Choose one creature within range. If the target is large or smaller, it's knocked {@condition prone}. If the target willingly moved on its last turn, they take {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage and any stance they are in ends.
Shove
Elite Skill. Target touched foe is knocked down. If that foe was moving, that foe's stance ends and that foe takes 15...63...75 damage before being knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the affected size category increases by 1 for every two slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shadow Form
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Turn your body into shadows.

For the duration, you cannot be targeted by hostile spells and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} per beneficial assassin themed spell on you and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, for the duration, you cannot deal more than 10 damage with a single damage roll.
Shadow Form

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...18...21 seconds, you cannot be the target of enemy spells, and you gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. You cannot deal more than 5...21...25 damage with a single skill or attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the final number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th and the damage maximum increases by 5 for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Spirit Light Weapon
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Spell|GWF}
Infuse a weapon with the calming light of a good spirit.

Choose one friendly creature, which is wielding a weapon, that you can see within range. For the duration, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. Additionally, while the creature is within 150-feet of a friendly summoning ritual, they regain additional hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier at the start of their turn.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing each increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Spirit Light Weapon
Elite Weapon Spell. For 10 seconds, target ally gains 1...12...15 Health per second and an additional 1...12...15 Health per second if that ally is within earshot of a spirit.

spell.name: Triple Chop

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Quickly perform multiple hit with your weapon, striking everything around you.

Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
Triple Chop
Elite Axe Attack. Attack target foe and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +10...34...40 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Whirling Axe

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 4, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Unblockable|GW}
Quickly whirl your weapon, feinting past your opponent's defenses and leaving them of balance.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, any stance on the target ends, and they take {@damage 2d6} damage
Whirling Axe
Elite Axe Attack. If Whirling Axe hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 4th on a hit.

spell.name: Snare (Guild Wars)
entries: Prepare a snare trap, crippling anyone stepping inside.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a non-chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effect for 1 round:

Each non-chosen creature must make a Strength saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, is {@condition crippled|GW} for one minute.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Strength saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
This trap is nearly {@condition invisible}, requiring a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC to be discerned.
Snare
Trap. When Snare is triggered, all nearby foes become Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds. Snare ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

spell.name: Tranquil Was Tanasen
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Urn|GWF}
Create a golden urn holding the ashes of Tanasen, who is said to have never raised their voice.

You create an Urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, you cannot be interrupted while casting spells or using abilities, you automatically succeed on Constitution saving throws made to hold {@status Concentration|XPHB}, and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Tranquil Was Tanasen
Elite Item Spell. Hold Tanasen's ashes for up to 5...17...20 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you have +10...22...25 armor and cannot be interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd

spell.name: Shadow Shroud
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Cover a creature in a shroud of shadow, hiding them from beneficial spells.
For the duration, the target cannot be the target of, or benefit from, beneficial spells.
Shadow Shroud
Elite Hex Spell. For 3...8...9 seconds, target foe cannot be the target of enchantments.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Vengeful Was Khanhei
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Urn|GWF}
Create a scarlet Urn containing the ashes of Khanhei, a revenant so vile they had to be banished by a high priestess of Dwayna.

You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, when you take damage from a creature, target that creature. The target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Vengeful Was Khanhei
Elite Item Spell. Hold Khanhei's ashes for 5...10...11 seconds. Whenever a foe strikes you in combat while you are holding Khanhei's ashes, you steal 5...29...35 Health from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Siphon Strength
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Tap into the energy flows of a creature, disrupting theirs and improving your understanding of them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration when the target makes a damage roll using a weapon, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, for the duration, the number someone needs to roll to score a critical hit against the target gets reduced by {@dice 1d4}

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st and the number someone needs to roll to score a critical hit against the target get reduced by 1 for each slot level above 1st.
Siphon Strength
Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe deals 5...41...50 less damage with attacks and all of your attacks against that foe have an additional 33% chance of being a critical hit.

spell.name: Wanderlust
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Wanderlust|GWF}
Call forth a spirit of wanderlust, punishing those who are not moving.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Wanderlust|GWF} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative but takes its turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DM's control.
Wanderlust

Elite Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. Whenever this spirit's attack hits a stationary foe, that foe is knocked down and the spirit loses 70...54...50 Health. This spirit dies after 30...54...60 seconds.

spell.name: Temple Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Off-Hand Attack|GWF}
Strike at a creature's weak point, disorienting them.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects is {@condition dazed|GW} and {@condition blinded} for the duration, and if it is {@status Concentration|XPHB|Concentrating}, its {@status Concentration|XPHB} is broken.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Temple Strike
Elite Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If this attack hits, target foe is Dazed and Blinded for 1...8...10 seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell, that foe is interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Weapon of Quickening
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Spell|GWF}
Temporarily transform a weapon into a quickening weapon, visibly making its appearance more sleek and elegant.

Choose one friendly creature, which is wielding a weapon, that you can see within range. For the duration, the target can cast spells as an action, even if they already cast a spell as a bonus action on their turn, and the target can cast spells which take an action to cast as a bonus action.
Weapon of Quickening
Elite Weapon Spell. For 5...21...25 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Quickening, and spells and binding rituals recharge 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Way of the Empty Palm
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Channel your energies into precision strikes.
For the duration, when you cast an {@variantrule Off-Hand Attack|GWF} or {@variantrule Dual Attack|GWF} spell of 1st level or lower, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
Way of the Empty Palm
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, off-hand and dual attacks cost no Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Black Lotus Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@variantrule Lead Attack|GWF}
Channel the mana gaining of the famed black lotus.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d12} damage. If the target was suffering from a harmful spell, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting.
Black Lotus Strike
Lead Attack. If it hits, Black Lotus Strike strikes for +10...27...31 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Hex, you gain 5...11...13 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Arc Lightning
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}
Conjure an arc of lightning, which can strike multiple targets.

Choose one creature within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 2d12} lightning damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
{@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} You can target two additional creatures within 15 of your original target with this spell as well.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.
Arc Lightning

Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...33...40 lightning damage. If you are Overcast, two foes near your target are struck for 15...71...85 lightning damage. Damage from Arc Lightning has 25% armor penetration.

spell.name: Accumulated Pain
entries: Suddenly intensify an already suffering creature's pain.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage and if the target is suffering from at least two different spells, they gain a {@condition deep wound|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Accumulated Pain
Spell. Target foe takes 15...63...75 damage. If target foe is suffering from 2 or more hexes, that foe suffers a Deep Wound for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Deny Hexes
entries: Deny any hexes by invoking your divine connection.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest N harmful spell on the target ends, where N is the number of spell slots expended since the last long rest, in the casting of divine themed spells, including this one.
Deny Hexes
Spell. Remove one hex from target ally and one additional hex for each recharging Divine Favor skill you have.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final N increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Animate Vampiric Horror
