entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Exploit a nearby corpse to create a Vampiric Horror.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, the target becomes a {@creature Vampiric Horror|GWF}.
The {@creature Vampiric Horror|GWF} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

The {@creature Vampiric Horror|GWF} is friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Vampiric Horror|GWF} becomes hostile towards everything, instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Vampiric Horror|GWF} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The {@creature Vampiric Horror|GWF} is in the DMs control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another bone horror this way.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Vampiric Horror
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...14...17 Vampiric Horror. Whenever a Vampiric Horror you control deals damage, you gain the same amount of Health.

spell.name: Bestial Mauling
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Command your companion to brutally maul a {@condition prone} creature.

Choose one companion, that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 6d6} damage, and if the target is {@condition prone}, it is {@condition dazed|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Bestial Mauling
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Mauling that deals +5...17...20 damage. If the attack strikes a knocked-down foe, that foe is Dazed for 4...9...10 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Ancestors' Rage
entries: Mark a creature for destruction, by invoking the rage of the ancestors.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. When this spell ends, each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d12} lightning damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Ancestors' Rage
Skill. For 1 second, nothing happens. When this skill ends, all foes adjacent to target ally are struck for 5...89...110 lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: None Shall Pass!
entries: Bellow out a command, forcing creatures to submit to your will.

Target each hostile creature, that willingly moved on its last turn, that can hear you within range. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Afterward, roll a {@dice d20}. On N or higher, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting of this spell, where N is 20 - the number of targets who failed their Saving Throw.
"None Shall Pass!"
Shout. All nearby foes that are moving are knocked down. This skill recharges 1...7...8 second[s] faster for each foe knocked down (maximum 25 seconds).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Bed of Coals
entries: Create a bed of coals, {@condition burning|GW} {@condition prone} creatures.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 10-foot-radius, 5-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 30 feet.
If a creature is {@condition prone} in the cylinder, they start {@condition burning|GW} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 1d6} damage. They can only start {@condition burning|GW} this way once per round.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Bed of Coals

Spell. Create a Bed of Coals at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to target foe are struck for 5...24...29 fire damage each second. Any foe knocked down on the Bed of Coals is set on fire for 3...6...7 seconds.

spell.name: Ethereal Light
entries: Channel ethereal light into a creature.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Ethereal Light
Spell. Target ally is healed for 25...85...100. This spell is easily interrupted.

spell.name: Blood Drinker
entries: Steal the life force from a creature, becoming more effective the more desperate you are.
If you are above 50% of your maximum hit points, you start {@condition bleeding|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
At the end of each of your turns, you can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Blood Drinker
Spell. If your Health is above 50%, you begin Bleeding for 10 seconds. Steal up to 20...56...65 Health from target foe.

spell.name: Anguished Was Lingwah
entries: {@variantrule Urn|GWF}
Create a scarlet urn containing the ashes of Lingwah, amplifying the anguish you inflict.

You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, your detrimental Ritualist themed spells which require {@status Concentration|XPHB} have their duration extended by 100%. When you cast one such spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting.
Anguished Was Lingwah

Item Spell. Hold Lingwah's ashes for up to 10...50...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your Ritualist hexes cost 1...4...5 less energy and last 33% longer. When you drop her ashes all your Ritualist hexes are recharged.

components.m: the ashes of a tortured creature

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd and the % increases by 50% for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: On Your Knees!
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 6
You lose all Adrenaline.

If there are any hostile {@condition prone} creatures within range, you can immediately cast any stance spell without using a spell slot, ignoring adrenaline cost, casting time and components, which you have prepared.
"On Your Knees!"
Shout. Lose all adrenaline. If any adjacent foes are knocked down, all of your stances are recharged.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blades of Steel

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light and thrown property

entries: {@variantrule Dual Attack|GWF}
Release a burst of stored power from your previous attacks.

Make two melee weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage Nd6} damage and, where N is the number of spell slots expended in the casting of light weapon attack themed spells.
Blades of Steel
Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...14...16 damage (maximum bonus 60) for each recharging dagger attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Critical Defenses
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Quickly deflect incoming attacks.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC. When you score a critical hit, the duration of this spell resets.
Critical Defenses
Enchantment Spell. For 4...9...10 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block. Critical Defenses refreshes every time you land a critical hit.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Breath of Fire
entries: {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 5
Release a continuous stream of dragon fire at a location.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 10-foot-radius, 10-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 60 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Breath of Fire
Spell. Create Breath of Fire at target foe's current location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 10...34...40 fire damage each second.

spell.name: Extinguish
entries: Relieve your parties conditions, healing them if you extinguished any {@condition burning|GW} creatures.

Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. End the latest of harmful condition on each target. If {@condition burning|GW} was removed this way, a target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
Extinguish
Spell. Remove one condition from each party member. Party members relieved of Burning are healed for 10...82...100 Health.

spell.name: Conflagration
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GW}
Call forth a spirit of Conflagration, which ignites all projectiles.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and deals non-fire damage with a ranged weapon attack, they instead deal fire damage.
Conflagration
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all arrows that hit strike for fire damage. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Binding Chains
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Conjure up the chains of the damned.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, a target's speed is reduced by 90%, and for every foot a target travels, they take {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage.
Binding Chains
Hex Spell. For 3 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes move 90% slower and take 1...24...30 damage each second while moving.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Destruction
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}, {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Destruction|GWF}
Bind a Spirit of Destruction to your will, which violently explodes upon death.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Destruction|GWF} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative but takes its turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DM's control.
Destruction

Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 Spirit that dies after 30 seconds. When this Spirit dies, all foes in the area take 5...21...25 damage for each second the Spirit was alive (maximum 150 damage).

spell.name: Retreat!
entries: Command your allies to "Retreat!" increasing their movement speed.
If there is an {@condition unconscious} or dead ally within range, choose any number of friendly creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, a target's speed is increased by 33%.
"Retreat!"
Shout. If there are any dead allies within earshot, your party moves 33% faster for 5...10...11 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the speed increases by 15% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Critical Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light and thrown property

entries: {@variantrule Dual Attack|GWF}
Aim for the weak spot of a creature.
Make two melee weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's critical effects, takes {@damage 1d10} damage, and you regain a level 1 spell slot.
Critical Strike
Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +10...26...30 damage, results in a critical hit, and you gain 1...3...3 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d10} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Dark Escape
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Briefly turn into shadow to escape.
For the duration, your speed increases by 25%, and you have resistance against all damage.
When you hit with an attack roll, this spell ends.
Dark Escape
Stance. For 5...13...15 seconds, you move 25% faster and take half damage. Dark Escape ends if you successfully hit with an attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the speed increases by 25% for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Burning Speed
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Use flames to boost your speed.
For the duration, you start {@condition burning|GW}, taking {@damage 1d6} damage. Additionally, for the duration, your speed is increased by 30%.
When this spell ends, each hostile creature in a 10-foot Emanation starts {@condition burning|GW} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.

This spell's hostile {@condition burning|GW} duration increases by 1 round when you reach 5th level (2 rounds), 11th level (3 rounds), and 17th level (4 rounds). Additionally, this spell's speed increase increases by 10% when you reach 5th level (40%), 11th level (50%), and 17th level (60%).
Burning Speed
Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you are set on fire and move 30...42...45% faster. When Burning Speed ends, all adjacent foes are set on fire for 3...8...9 seconds.

spell.name: Auspicious Incantation
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Incant a long-forgotten incantation, warping your spellcasting.
For the duration, the next spell of 5th level or lower you cast does not expend a spell slot but cannot be cast again until you finish a short rest.
Auspicious Incantation
Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, the next spell you cast is disabled for an additional 10...6...5 seconds, and you gain 110...182...200% of that spell's Energy cost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Gift of Health
entries: Gift another creature healing.

Choose one creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 8d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. For the duration, you cannot cast spells that restore hit points, grant additional hit points, or grant temporary hit points.
Gift of Health
Spell. All of your other Healing Prayers skills are disabled for 10...6...5 seconds. Target other ally is healed for 15...123...150 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 4d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Enfeebling Touch
entries: Siphon off a creature's strength with a withering touch.
Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage and is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Enfeebling Touch
Skill. Target touched foe loses 5...41...50 Health and suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Focused Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: Focus fully on this one shot, disregarding any other options.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage, and you cannot use other spells with a Special casting time for 2 rounds.

At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage to the target on a hit ({@dice 2d6}). This damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).
Focused Shot
Bow Attack. If Focused Shot hits, you strike for +10...22...25 damage but all of your other attack skills are disabled for 5...3...3 seconds.

spell.name: Disenchantment
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Disenchantment|GWF}
Call forth a spirit of disenchantment, pulling creatures back to reality.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Disenchantment|GWF} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative but takes its turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DM's control.
Disenchantment
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. This spirit deals 5...17...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack loses one enchantment. This spirit dies after 10...30...35 seconds.

spell.name: Displacement
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Displacement|GWF}
Bind a Spirit of Displacement to your will, blurring reality around your allies.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Displacement|GWF} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative but takes its turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DM's control.
Displacement

Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. All non-spirit allies within its range have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Every time an attack is blocked in this way, this spirit takes 60 damage. This spirit dies after 30...54...60 seconds.

spell.name: You Will Die!
entries: Promise death to a creature, pumping yourself up for the next strike.
Choose one hostile creature that can hear you within range. If the target is bloodied, you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenaline.
This spell's adrenaline gain increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).
"You Will Die!"
Shout. If target foe is below 50% Health, you gain 1...3...3 strike[s] of adrenaline.

spell.name: Dark Prison
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Conjure a dark prison around a creature for a short while.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition restrained} for the duration.
Dark Prison
Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. For 1...5...6 seconds, that foe moves 33% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Desperate Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@variantrule Lead Attack|GWF}
Use your desperation to inflict harm.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and if you were below 50% of your maximum hit points, the target takes {@damage 1d8} damage.

At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} damage to the target on a hit ({@dice 2d8}). This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 3d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).
Additionally, this spell's % increases by 10% when you reach 5th level (60%), 11th level (70%), and 17th level (80%).
Desperate Strike
Lead Attack. If you have less than 50...74...80% Health, you deal +15...51...60 damage.

spell.name: Churning Earth
entries: Create an area of churning earth, which grasps at everything passing through.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 15-foot-radius, 10-foot-high cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d8} force damage, and targets who willingly moved on their last turn are knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 30 feet.
Churning Earth

Spell. Create Churning Earth at target foe's location. For the next 5 seconds, Churning Earth strikes foes near that location for 10...34...40 earth damage each second. Any foe moving faster than normal when struck by Churning Earth is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Complicate

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: Distract a creature with a string of complicated arcane interruptions.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. The creature makes an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the spell/ability dissipates with no effect, the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast/use it is wasted, and the creature and all hostile creatures within 20 feet of it, cannot use that spell/ability for the duration. If a spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.
Complicate
Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that skill is interrupted and disabled for target foe and all foes in the area for an additional 5...11...12 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Fetid Ground
entries: Corrupt the area beneath a creature, sending up vile fumes.

Choose a point within range. Each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. {@condition Prone|XPHB} creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} poison damage. {@condition Prone|XPHB} creatures are also {@condition corruption|GW|corrupted} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d6} damage if they fail their save.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Fetid Ground
Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...55...65 cold damage. If that foe is knocked down, that foe becomes Poisoned for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Marauder's Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: Start vivaciously focusing only on damaging creatures for a while.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage, and you cannot use spells with a non-Special casting time for 2 rounds.

At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage to the target on a hit ({@dice 2d6}). This damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).
Marauder's Shot
Bow Attack. If Marauder's Shot hits, you strike for +10...30...35 damage and all your non-attack skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

spell.name: Dulled Weapon
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Dull the weapons of a group of creatures by calling forth tired spirits.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each weapon (including natural weapons) in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point has its damage die reduced by one stage for the duration ({@dice d20} -> {@dice d12} -> {@dice d10} -> {@dice d8} -> {@dice d6} -> {@dice d4} -> 1) and can no longer critical hit. A creature wielding an affected weapon can make a Wisdom saving throw to avoid the effect.
Dulled Weapon
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes cannot achieve a critical hit and deal 1...12...15 less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the die type decreases by an additional one stage for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Earthbind (Guild Wars)
entries: {@variantrule Summoning Ritual|GW|Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Earthbind|GWF}
Bind a Spirit of Earthbind to your will, preventing creatures from standing up.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Earthbind|GWF} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative but takes its turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DM's control.
Earthbind

Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. All non-spirit foes knocked down within its range are knocked down for at least 3 seconds. Whenever this happens, this spirit loses 50...30...25 Health. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.

spell.name: Auspicious Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5
Strike at an opportune moment.

If the target is suffering from {@condition weakness|GW}, this attack gains the {@variantrule Unblockable|GW} property. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d4} damage, and your initiative increases by {@dice 1d4}.
Auspicious Blow
Hammer Attack. If Auspicious Blow hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage and gain 3...7...8 Energy. If target foe is suffering from Weakness, this attack is unblockable.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d4} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit, and the increase in initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Disrupting Stab

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@variantrule Lead Attack|GWF}
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If an ability or spell failed this way, the ability/spell can't be used again for the duration.
Disrupting Stab
Lead Attack. If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, it is disabled for 3...9...10 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Enduring Toxin
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Infuse a creature's body with a vile toxin.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 2d4} poison damage.
When this spell ends, and the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target is immediately hexed with Enduring Toxin again.
Enduring Toxin
Hex Spell. For 5 seconds, target foe suffers -1...4...5 Health degeneration. If that foe is moving when Enduring Toxin would end, Enduring Toxin is renewed for another 5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Glyph of Essence
entries: Inscribe the Glyph of Essence on your arcane focus, accelerating your spellcasting at the cost of your arcane power.
For the duration, the next {@dice 1d4} spells, with a casting time of one minute or less, can be cast as a reaction, but if cast this way, your initiative gets reduced by 10 each time.
Glyph of Essence
Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell casts instantly but causes you to lose all Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Conjure Nightmare
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Force a creature to relive its most horrid nightmare.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 3d12} psychic damage.
Conjure Nightmare
Hex Spell. For 2...13...16 seconds, target foe suffers -8 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Gaze of Contempt
entries: Gaze into a creature's soul, severing any connections it has to the spells affecting it.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the creature is not Bloodied, all beneficial spells on the target end.
Gaze of Contempt
Spell. If target foe has more than 50% Health, that foe loses all enchantments.

spell.name: Needling Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: Fire a volley of low-impact shots.

Make a ranged weapon attack with advantage against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6 + 5} piercing damage, and you can immediately make another attack, if you also cast Needling Shot as part of that attack. If you do so, you can ignore the rule that you only cast one spell with a spell slot per turn.
Hit or miss, you cannot use other spells with a Special casting time for 2 rounds.
Needling Shot

Bow Attack. Needling Shot strikes for only 10...26...30 damage and moves faster than normal. If Needling Shot strikes a foe below 50% Health, Needling Shot recharges instantly. Your other attack skills are disabled for 2 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6 + 5} piercing damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Essence Strike
entries: Use life essence to shock a creature; you can draw that essence from a friendly spirit nearby.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d12} lightning damage.
If there is at least one friendly {@variantrule summoning ritua|GW}within range, you do not expend a spell slot to cast this spell.
Essence Strike
Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...51...60 lightning damage. If any spirits are within earshot, you gain 1...7...9 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Explosive Growth
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Create a shock nova around creatures you summon.

For the duration, when you summon/create a creature, target each hostile creature in a 15-foot Emanation around on the creature. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d12} lightning damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Explosive Growth
Enchantment Spell. For 15...51...60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, up to 5 foes near that creature are struck for 20...56...65 lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.
Additionally, when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Fierce Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 6
Use your opponent's momentary {@condition weakness|GW} to inflict a devastating wound.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage, and if the target is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened}, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Fierce Blow
Hammer Attack. If Fierce Blow hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If target foe was [sic] suffering from Weakness, that foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for 1...7...8 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Exhausting Assault

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light and thrown property

entries: {@variantrule Dual Attack|GWF}
Sever a creature's energy flows, exhausting them instantly.

Make two melee weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d12} damage and the target is {@condition overcast|GW} and {@condition exhaustion|XPHB|exhausted} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Exhausting Assault
Dual Attack. Must follow a lead attack. Target foe's action is interrupted. If that action was casting a spell, target foe suffers 10 Overcast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 4th on a hit.

spell.name: Expose Defenses
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW},

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, your attacks automatically hit the target and gain the {@variantrule Unblockable|GW} property.
Expose Defenses
Hex Spell. For 1...9...11 second[s], target foe cannot block your attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number you need to score a critical hit against the target decreases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Icy Prism
entries: Send out streaks of cold energy.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 5d8} cold damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

{@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} Each creature other than the target in a 15-foot Emanation around the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 5d8} cold damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Icy Prism
Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...63...75 cold damage. If that foe has a Water Magic hex, Icy Prism deals +[sic]15...63...75 cold damage to all other nearby foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ether Signet
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your ether signet, regaining some expended spell energy the signet captured.
If you do not have any spell slots of level 4 or lower left, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level equal to 4.
Ether Signet
Signet. If you have less than 5...9...10 Energy, gain 10...18...20 Energy.

spell.name: Arcane Thievery/Arcane Larceny
entries: Use your arcane skills to steal an enemies spell.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed safe, one random spell the target has prepared cannot be used for the duration. Also replace this spell with the disabled spell for the duration.
Arcane Thievery
Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe, and Arcane Thievery is replaced by that spell.
Arcane Larceny
Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe and Arcane Larceny is replaced by that spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target makes its saving throw with disadvantage. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can choose which spell gets disabled.

spell.name: Tiger's Fury/Bestial Fury
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Invoke the great spirit of the tiger, entering a fury in which you can attack more often but cannot cast any spells.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, but you cannot cast spells.
Tiger's Fury
Stance. All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.
Bestial Fury
Stance. All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Desecrate Enchantments/Defile Enchantments
entries: Turn the enchantments of a group of creatures against them, dealing increased damage per enchantment on them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage. If a target was under the effect of a beneficial spell, a target takes an additional {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage per beneficial spell on them. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Desecrate Enchantments
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 6...49...60 shadow damage and 4...17...20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.
Defile Enchantments
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 6...49...60 shadow damage and 4...17...20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the base damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Earthquake/Dragon's Stomp
entries: {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 5
Cause a massive earthquake in a small area, knocking down creatures and damaging them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 10d6} force damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Earthquake
Spell. You invoke an Earthquake at target foe's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for 26...85...100 earth damage.
Dragon's Stomp
Spell. You invoke a Dragon's Stomp at target foe's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for 26...85...100 earth damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Desperation Blow/Drunken Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: You attempt a desperate blow, uncertain of the outcome.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d12} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, roll a {@dice d4}. Depending on the result, the target gains one of the following conditions for the duration: 1 - {@condition Deep Wound|GW}, 2 - {@condition Weakness|GW}, 3 - {@condition Bleeding|GW} ({@damage 2d4} damage), 4 - {@condition Crippled|GW}.
You are knocked {@condition prone}, and cannot stand up this turn.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Desperation Blow

Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage, and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Desperation Blow, you are knocked down.
Drunken Blow

Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Drunken Blow, you are knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Divine Healing/Heaven's Delight
entries: Bestow upon your party the divine grace of your deity.
Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Divine Healing
Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...51...60 points.
Heaven's Delight
Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...51...60 points.

spell.name: Symbol of Wrath/Kirin's Wrath
entries: Sear a holy symbol of wrath on the surrounding ground, smiting all hostile creatures around you.

Conjure a 10-foot radius, 10-foot high stationary Cylinder at your location for the duration. Each creature, other than you, in that Cylinder must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder to your location.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Symbol of Wrath

Kirin's Wrath
Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8...27...32 holy damage each second.

spell.name: Lacerating Chop

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d6} damage, and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, it starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Lacerating Chop
Axe Attack. If Lacerating Chop hits, you deal +5...17...20 damage. If it strikes a knocked down foe your target suffers from Bleeding for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: Channel the power of the griffon, dive attacking, knocking {@condition prone} and damaging even on a miss.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
On a miss, the target takes {@damage 2d8} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Griffon's Sweep
Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...29...34 damage.
Leviathan's Sweep
Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...29...34 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot

spell.name: Shadow Strike/Lifebane Strike
entries: Strike a creature with a shadowy claw, stealing life from them if they are above 50% health.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage. If the target was above 50% of their maximum hit points, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt.
Shadow Strike
Spell. Target foe takes 12...41...48 shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to 12...41...48 Health.
Lifebane Strike
Spell. Target foe takes 12...41...48 shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to 12...41...48 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5, {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}
You crush past an enemies defenses.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
Penetrating Blow
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. This axe attack has 20% armor penetration.
Penetrating Chop
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. This axe attack has 20% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot

spell.name: Inspired Enchantment/Revealed Enchantment
entries: Remove a positive spell on a creature, gain initiative and replace this spell with the removed spell for the duration.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed safe, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4} and replace this spell with the ended spell for the duration.
Inspired Enchantment
Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe and gain 3...13...15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.
Revealed Enchantment
Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe and gain 3...13...15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Revealed Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Inspired Hex/Revealed Hex
entries: Remove a negative spell on a creature, gain initiative and replace this spell with the removed spell for the duration.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4} and replace this spell with the ended spell for the duration.
Inspired Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4...9...10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.
Revealed Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4...9...10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Revealed Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 8

Galrath Slash
Sword Attack. This attack strikes for +1...32...40 damage if it hits.
Silverwing Slash
Sword Attack. This attack strikes for +1...32...40 damage if it hits.

spell.name: Penetrating Attack/Sundering Attack

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}
You fire a penetrating shot, which pierces your enemies defenses.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
Penetrating Attack
Bow Attack. If Penetrating Attack hits, you strike for +5...21...25 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.
Sundering Attack
Bow Attack. If Sundering Attack hits, you strike for +5...21...25 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.

Heal Area
Spell. Heal yourself and all adjacent creatures for 30...150...180 points.
Karei's Healing Circle
Spell. Heal yourself and all adjacent creatures for 30...150...180 points.

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Jaundiced Gaze
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Stare at a creature with a bloodcurdling gaze.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, for the duration, the next {@status Concentration|XPHB} spell of 5th level or lower you cast can be cast as a reaction. Additionally, it can be cast with a spell slot that is 1 level lower than required (minimum 1).
Jaundiced Gaze

Enchantment Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, for the next 1...12...15 second[s], your next enchantment spell casts 0...1...1 second[s] faster and costs 1...8...10 less Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the required spell slot gets reduced by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Poisonous Bite
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Infuse your pets strike with poison and command them to attack.

Choose one companion that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is corrupted for the duration, taking {@damage 1d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).
Poisonous Bite
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Poisonous Bite that Poisons target foe for 5...17...20 seconds.

spell.name: Feast of Souls
entries: Feast on the souls of nearby spirits to heal your allies.

Target each friendly {@variantrule summoning ritual|GW} within range. They die. For each {@variantrule summoning ritual|GW} that died this way, friendly creatures within 300 feet of you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Feast of Souls
Spell. Destroy all nearby allies' spirits. For each spirit destroyed in this way, all party members are healed for 50...90...100 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

If there is at least one friendly {@variantrule summoning ritua|GW}within range, the target is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...56...65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit, that foe is Blinded for 2...5...6 seconds.

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st and the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 3d6} damage.
If you are not in a stance, this attack gains the Unblockable property.
Pure Strike
Sword Attack. If Pure Strike hits, you strike for +1...24...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Pure Strike cannot be blocked.
Jaizhenju Strike
Sword Attack. If Jaizhenju Strike hits, you strike for +1...24...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Jaizhenju Strike cannot be blocked.

On a hit, if you are under the effect of a beneficial {@status Concentration|XPHB} spell, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and all hostile creatures within a 10-foot Emanation around you take {@damage 4d8} damage.

Off-Hand Attack. If you are not under the effects of an enchantment, this skill misses. If it hits, Golden Phoenix Strike deals +10...26...30 damage and all adjacent foes take 10...26...30 damage.

Shock Arrow

Spell. Send out a shocking arrow that flies swiftly toward target foe, striking for 5...41...50 lightning damage. If Shock Arrow strikes a foe suffering from Cracked Armor, you gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage. Shock Arrow has 25% armor penetration.

spell.name: Feedback

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d6}.
Feedback
Spell. Target foe loses one enchantment. If an enchantment is removed in this way, that foe also loses 4...9...10 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot

spell.name: Oppressive Gaze

On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} necrotic damage, and targets suffering from a harmful condition are {@condition Weakness|GW|weakened} and {@condition corruption|GW|corrupted} taking {@damage 2d8} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Oppressive Gaze
Spell. Target foe and adjacent foes take 10...26...30 shadow damage. Foes already suffering from a condition are Poisoned and Weakened for 3...10...12 seconds.

spell.name: Pounce

Command your companion to pounce on a creature with all their weight.

Choose one companion that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 3d10} damage and, if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Pounce
Pet Attack. Your animal companion's next attack is a Pounce that deals +5...17...20 damage. If the attack strikes a moving foe, that foe is knocked down.

If there is at least one friendly {@variantrule summoning ritual|GW} within range, each target also takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
Lamentation

Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0...2...3 Health degeneration. When this hex is applied, these foes take 10...42...50 damage if you are within earshot of a spirit or corpse.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d12} damage, and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, you regain a level 1 spell slot and can immediately attack again.
Renewing Smash
Hammer Attack. If Renewing Smash hits, it deals +10...34...40 damage. If you hit a knocked-down foe, you gain 3 Energy and this attack recharges instantly.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Heart of Shadow

You regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. Choose one creature that you can see within range. Teleport up to 15 feet away from your target to an unoccupied space on solid ground. If you target yourself, teleport to a random location within range that is not obstructed.
Heart of Shadow
Spell. You are healed for 30...126...150. Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels

If your last attack was a {@variantrule Dual Attack|GWF} choose one creature that you can see within range. The target takes {@damage 3d10} force damage and has a {@condition Deep Wound|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Impale
Skill. Must follow a dual attack. Target foe is struck for 25...85...100 earth damage and suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...17...20 seconds.

spell.name: Smoldering Embers
entries: Lodge {@condition burning|GW} coals into a creature's body.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage.
{@variantrule Hex|GW}

{@variantrule Overcast:|GW} On a hit, for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target must make a Constiution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Smoldering Embers
Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...58...70 fire damage. If you are Overcast, that foe is hexed with Smoldering Embers for 3 seconds and takes 5...21...25 additional fire damage each second.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot

spell.name: Hex Eater Signet
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your Hex Eater Signet, transforming harmful spells into power.

You touch a creature. The latest harmful spell on the target ends. Additionally, end the latest harmful spell on {@dice 1d4} creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you. For each harmful spell ended this way, you regain a level 1 spell slot.
Hex Eater Signet
Signet. Target touched ally and up to 2...4...5 adjacent allies each lose one hex. You gain 1...3...4 Energy for each hex removed this way.

variantrule.name: Dual Attack
entries: This spell can only be cast if your last successful attack against the target was an {@variantrule Off-Hand Attack|GWF}.
On a hit, this attack is considered a Dual Attack.

Using a spell slot to cast a Dual Attack does not prevent you from using spell slots to cast {@variantrule Lead Attack|GWF|Lead Attacks}, {@variantrule Off-Hand Attack|GWF|Off-Hand Attacks} or {@variantrule Dual Attack|GWF|Dual Attacks} on the same turn.

variantrule.name: Lead Attack
entries: On a hit, this attack is considered a Lead Attack.

Using a spell slot to cast a Lead Attack does not prevent you from using spell slots to cast {@variantrule Lead Attack|GWF|Lead Attacks}, {@variantrule Off-Hand Attack|GWF|Off-Hand Attacks} or {@variantrule Dual Attack|GWF|Dual Attacks} on the same turn.

variantrule.name: Off-Hand Attack
entries: This spell can only be cast if your last successful attack against the target was a {@variantrule Lead Attack|GWF}.
On a hit, this attack is considered an Off-Hand Attack.

Using a spell slot to cast an Off-Hand Attack does not prevent you from using spell slots to cast {@variantrule Lead Attack|GWF|Lead Attacks}, {@variantrule Off-Hand Attack|GWF|Off-Hand Attacks} or {@variantrule Dual Attack|GWF|Dual Attacks} on the same turn.

variantrule.name: Urn
entries: The urn created by the spell must be held with two hands and cannot be thrown.
The urn can be used as a spellcasting focus, and does not prevent you from casting spells requiring somatic or material components as normal.
When creating another urn while already holding one, the spell ends.
When the spell ends, you drop the urn.
When you drop the urn, the spell ends.
The urn disappears when you drop it.
You can drop the urn on your turn as a free action, or as a reaction if it is not your turn.
If you are Incapacitated you drop your urn.
If you drop your urn because you dropped unconscious because you fell to 0 hit points, you cannot gain the benefit of any healing the urn would provide.

variantrule.name: Weapon Spell
entries: If a target gains a new Weapon Spell, the spell ends.
If a target drops or lets go of the weapon affected by the spell, the spell ends.

background.name: Allegiance rank
entries: Allegiance rank is a term for a pair of title tracks: the Friend of the Kurzicks title track and the Friend of the Luxons title track. They are earned for your account through the transfer of Kurzick faction or Luxon faction. These titles can be displayed in the 'Honor' monument from tier 4 onwards.

background.name: Assassin
entries: The Assassin walks the shadows, a deadly viper ready to strike at the heart when the enemy least expects it, nowhere and everywhere all at once. Assassins are masters of their chosen weapon, the dagger, and are expert at inflicting Critical Strikes that cause massive damage. The Assassin is trained to efficiently link attacks together in a chain that does not give the enemy a chance to hit back. They have mastered the ability to move as shadows—Assassins wear only lightweight armor and prefer to avoid damage by not being there when the enemy’s strike lands. Their other magical skills include Hexes that lower the target’s defenses and protect the Assassin from harm.

background.name: Channeling Magic
entries: No inherent effect. Many Ritualist skills, especially those related to lightning damage and Energy, become more effective with higher Channeling Magic.

background.name: Communing
entries: No inherent effect. Many Ritualist skills, especially those related to summoning Spirits, become more effective with higher Communing.

background.name: Critical Strikes
entries: For each rank of Critical Strikes you have, you gain an additional 1% chance to critical hit. Whenever you critical hit, you gain 1 energy at ranks 3 and above, 2 energy at ranks 8 and above, and 3 energy at 13 ranks above.

background.name: Dagger Mastery
entries: Dagger Mastery increases the damage you do with daggers and your chance to inflict a critical hit when using a dagger. There is a 2% chance per rank of Dagger Mastery that attacks from your daggers will double strike. Many skills, especially dagger attack skills, become more effective with higher Dagger Mastery.

background.name: Deadly Arts
entries: No Inherent effect. Many Assassins skills, especially those related to harming enemies, become more effective with higher Deadly Arts.

background.name: Echovald Forest
entries: The Echovald Forest is the ancestral home of the Kurzick people. Originally teeming with life, the Jade Wind has since petrified all natural life within the forest. Silence pervades the air that the music of life once filled. Despite the calamity that has befallen their home, the Kurzicks stayed, as only they were able to adapt to their new environment and carve dwellings amongst the petrified trees. Through the generations, life has found a way back into the forest, with unique species of flora and fauna thriving within the petrified forest.

background.name: The Jade Sea
entries: The Jade Sea is located on the southeastern side of the Canthan continent. It is the home of the Luxons, whose entire watery realm was frozen into solid jade when the Jade Wind swept across the region.

background.name: Kaineng City
entries: Kaineng City is the capital of the Empire of the Dragon. It is a huge metropolis that covers a large portion of northwestern Cantha. 'Kaineng' is Old Canthan for 'Emperor', giving the city the name of 'Emperor City.'

background.name: No Attribute - Assassin
entries: No Attribute skills are those which are not tied to a particular attribute. Effects of these unlinked skills are almost always constant; for example, Remove Hex always removes a single hex, whereas the Protection Prayers spell, Divert Hexes removes 1...3...3 hexes, depending on the caster's rank in that attribute.

background.name: No Attribute - Ritualist
entries: No Attribute skills are those which are not tied to a particular attribute. Effects of these unlinked skills are almost always constant; for example, Remove Hex always removes a single hex, whereas the Protection Prayers spell, Divert Hexes removes 1...3...3 hexes, depending on the caster's rank in that attribute.

background.name: Restoration Magic
entries: No inherent effect. Many Ritualist skills, especially those related to healing, life-stealing, and defense, become more effective with higher Restoration Magic.

background.name: Ritualist
entries: Ritualists channel other-worldly energies that summon allies from the void and employ mystic binding rituals that bend those allies to the Ritualist's will. They hood their eyes to better commune with spirits that grant great power and protection to Ritualists and their comrades. The energy they channel drives Ritualist skills which enhance the deadliness of an ally's weapon and wreak havoc on an enemy's health. The Ritualist can also use the remains of the dead to defend the living-not by reanimating corpses as a Necromancer would, but through the ritual use of urns and ashes. Where the Ranger lives as one with the spirit world, the Ritualist can and will be its master.

background.name: Shadow Arts
entries: No inherent effect. Many Assassin skills, especially those related to defense and moving as a shadow, become more effective with higher Shadow Arts.

background.name: Shing Jea Island
entries: Shing Jea Island lies to the west of the Canthan mainland, southwest across the sea from Kaineng City. It is an idyllic place with farming and fishing settlements sparsely dotting the rural countryside. The primary population centers include Shing Jea Monastery and Seitung Harbor; the former being a center for profession training and latter the primary docks and center of trade for the island.

background.name: Spawning Power
entries: For each rank of Spawning Power you have, creatures you create (or animate) have 4% more Health, and weapon Spells you cast last 4% longer. Some Ritualist skills, especially those related to Spirit creatures, become more effective with higher Spawning Power.
